sqlMap.insert: INSERT INTO GS_CNSR_M ( CNSR_CD , AUTH_CD , CNS_GB , CENTER_GB , CNSR_GB , CNSR_NM , ZONE_GB, LOCAL_GB, POSI , MAJOR , EDU , SOCIAL_WORK_PROV , CNS_PROV , APPRV_YN , USE_YN , USER_ID , BIRTH_DT , AGE , SIGUN_CD , DB_INS_TM ) VALUES ( (SELECT IFNULL(MAX(CAST(CNSR_CD AS SIGNED)),0)+1 FROM GS_CNSR_M AS A) , #authCd# , #cnsGb# , #centerGb# , #authCd# , #cnsrNm# , #zoneGb#, '9', #posi# , #major# , #edu# , #socialWorkProv# , #cnsProv# , 'N' , 'Y' , #userId# , #birthDt# , #age# , #sigunCd# , now() )

INSERT INTO GS_USER_M ( AUTH_CD , USER_ID , PW , USER_NM , GENDER , BIRTH_DT , MOBILE , EMAIL , ACPT_DT , SIGUN_CD , USE_YN ) values ( #authCd# , #userId# , SCP.ENC_B64('KEY1',#pw#) , #cnsrNm# , #gender# , #birthDt# , #mobile# , #email# , DATE_FORMAT(NOW(), '%Y-%m-%d') , #sigunCd# , 'Y' )
